AT.name: Titan Attacks!
AT.description: Vertreibe die einfallende Titanen-Armee in dieser Neuauflage klassischer Arcade-Shoot 'em Ups! Schlage die Aliens im gesamten Sonnensystem zurück und besiege sie auf ihrer Heimatwelt. Titan Attacks! Bietet das selbe leicht zu lernende aber zu meisternde Spielerlebnis wie klassische Arcade-Shooter, kommt vollgepackt mit neuen Funktionen, Strategien und aufwendiger neo-retro Grafik. KÄMPFE gegen feindliche Aliens, Bomber und Mutterschiffe in 5 einzigartigen Welten und 100 actiongeladenen Levels. WEHRE die Invasion der Titanen auf der ganzen Erde, dem Mond, Mars, Saturn und schließlich auf Titan ab. VERDIENE Kopfgeld und verbessere dein Schiff mit neuen Waffen und Funktionen. ZERSTÖRE Wracks, weiche Asteroiden aus und fange entflohene Aliens wieder ein. Oder pulverisiere sie. GEWINNE Preise in Scharfschützen-Herausforderungen und kämpfe mit anderen Spielern um deinen Platz in den Online-Bestenlisten.

AU.name: Titan Attacks!
AU.description: Single-handedly turn back the evil invading Titan army! Drive back the aliens across the Solar System, and finally defeat them on their homeworld in this modern remix of classic arcade shoot'em'ups. Titan Attacks! has the same easy-to-learn but hard-to-master gameplay of classic arcade shooters, but is packed full of new features, new strategies, and stylish neo-retro visuals. BATTLE swarms of alien fighters, bombers and giant boss motherships over 5 unique worlds and 100 levels of frantic action! FIGHT the Titan Invasion across the Earth, the Moon, Mars, Saturn and finally Titan itself! EARN bounty money and upgrade your ship with new weapons and powers! DESTROY falling wrecks, dodge hurtling asteroids and capture escaping aliens - or blast them from the skies! WIN prizes in sharp-shooter challenge stages and compete with other players for a place on the online leaderboards!

BG.name: Titan Attacks!

WIN prizes in sharp-shooter challenge stages and compete with other players for a place on the online leaderboards!

BE.name: Titan Attacks!
BE.description: Repoussez l'armée des envahisseurs titans à travers le Système solaire et triomphez d'elle sur sa propre planète dans ce remix de shoot 'em ups classiques. Titan Attacks! a le même gameplay facile à apprendre et difficile à maîtriser que les shoot 'em ups classiques mais est agrémenté de fonctionnalités et de stratégies modernes, ainsi que de graphismes néo-rétro. AFFRONTEZ des chasseurs et des bombardiers aliens ainsi que des vaisseaux-mères géants dans 5 mondes uniques et 100 niveaux d’action ! REPOUSSEZ l’invasion alien sur la Terre, la Lune, Mars et Saturne pour combattre l’ennemi sur Titan ! REMPORTEZ des primes et achetez des armes et des capacités pour votre vaisseau ! DÉTRUISEZ des épaves, esquivez des astéroïdes et capturez des aliens... ou explosez tout à coups de blasters ! GAGNEZ des prix dans des défis et comparez vos scores grâce à des classements en ligne !

ES.name: Titan Attacks!
ES.description: ¡Haz retroceder al ejército invasor de Titanes por todo el sistema solar y derrótalos en su planeta de origen en este moderno remix del clásico shoot 'em ups. Titan Attacks! como todo shooter arcade, parece fácil pero es difícil de dominar, y viene cargado de nuevas características y estrategias en un moderno estilo retro. ¡ENFRÉNTATE a una multitud de soldados, bombarderos y grandes naves alienígenas a través de 5 mundos únicos y 100 niveles cargados de pura acción! LUCHA contra la invasión de Titanes sobre la Tierra, la Luna, Marte, Saturno y finalmente... Titán! ¡CONSIGUE grandes recompensas de dinero y mejora tu nave con nuevas armas y potenciadores! DESTRUYE los restos de las naves, esquiva asteroides y captura a los alieígenas..., ¡o hazlos pedazos! ¡GANA premios en fases de desafío y compite contra otros jugadores para subir de posición en los marcadores!

IT.name: Titan Attacks!
IT.description: Con le tue sole forze, fai retrocedere l’armata dei Titani nel Sistema solare, fino a sconfiggerli sul loro stesso pianeta d'origine in questo moderno remix del classico sparatutto arcade. Giocare a Titan Attacks! è facilissimo: basta sparare - ma imparare a farlo sul serio è tutt’altra cosa! AFFRONTA nugoli di guerrieri alieni, bombardieri e gigantesche navi ammiraglie in 5 mondi con oltre 100 livelli di adrenalina pura! COMBATTI l’invasione dei Titani sulla Terra, Luna, Marte, Saturno e infine... Titania! GUADAGNA generose ricompense in denaro e potenzia la tua astronave con nuove armi e nuovi poteri! DISTRUGGI vecchi relitti, schiva pericolosi asteroidi e cattura alieni in fuga – o spazzali via dalla faccia del Sistema solare! VINCI premi in sfide da tiratore scelto e tieni alto il tuo nome nelle classifiche online!

NL.name: Titan Attacks!
NL.description: Stop in je eentje het kwade Titan-leger! Drijf de aliens door het zonnestelsel en versla ze uiteindelijk in hun thuiswereld in deze moderne remix van klassieke arcade shoot'em'ups. Titan Attacks! heeft dezelfde eenvoudig-te-leren-maar-moeilijk-te-beheersen gameplay van klassieke arcadeshooters, maar zit bomvol nieuwe onderdelen, strategieën en stijlvolle neo-retro graphics. BESTRIJD horden buitenaardse gevechtsvliegtuigen, bommenwerpers en gigantische moederschepen in 5 unieke werelden met 100 actierijke levels! VECHT tegen de invasies van de Titanen op Aarde, de Maan, Mars, Saturnus en uiteindelijk Titan zelf! VERDIEN premies en upgrade je schip met nieuwe wapens en krachten! VERNIETIG vallende wrakken, ontwijk asteroïden en vang aliens die op de vlucht slaan - of schiet ze uit de lucht! WIN prijzen in scherpschuttersuitdagingen en strijd met andere spelers voor een plaats in het online klassement!

NZ.name: Titan Attacks!
NZ.description: Single-handedly turn back the evil invading Titan army! PT.name: Titan Attacks!
PT.description: Vence sozinho o maléfico exército invasor de Titã! Nesta moderna reinvenção dos jgoso clássicos de tiros das máquinas afasta os alienígenas do Sistema Solar e vence-os no seu planeta-natal. Titan Attacks! tem o mesmo gameplay fácil de aprender mas difícil de dominar dos jogos clássicos de tiros das máquinas, mas cheio de novas funcionalidads, estratégias e gráficos neo-retro incríveis. COMBATE enxames de caças, bombardeiros e naves-mãe gigantes dos alienígenas em mais de 5 mundos diferentes e 100 níveis de acção! LUTA contra a invasão dos habitantas de Titã da Terra, Lua, Marte, Saturno e, por fim, do próprio planeta Titã! GANHA prémios de recompensas e melhora a tua nave com novas armas e poderes! DESTRÓI destroços em queda, esquiva-te de asteróides e captura alienígenas em fuga - ou limpa-os dos céus! GANHA prémios em etapas de atirador e disputa um lugar nas classificações online com os outros jogadores!

RU.name: Titan Attacks!
RU.description: Собственноручно отправьте в бегство злых захватчиков с Титана в современном ремиксе классической аркадной стрелялки! Titan Attacks! подарит вам простой, но одновременно сложный в овладении игровой процесс, дополненный кучей новых опций, стратегий и спецэффектов. СРАЖАЙТЕСЬ против инопланетных орд! ДАЙТЕ отпор захватчикам с Титана! ЗАРАБАТЫВАЙТЕ на улучшения! УНИЧТОЖАЙТЕ все на своем пути! ЗАВОЕВЫВАЙТЕ призы!

BATTLE swarms of alien fighters, bombers and giant boss motherships over 5 unique worlds and 100 levels of frantic action! FIGHT the Titan Invasion across the Earth, the Moon, Mars, Saturn and finally Titan itself! EARN bounty money and upgrade your ship with new weapons and powers! DESTROY falling wrecks, dodge hurtling asteroids and capture escaping aliens - or blast them from the skies! WIN prizes in sharp-shooter challenge stages and compete with other players for a place on the online leaderboards!

SI.name: Titan Attacks!
SI.description: Single-handedly turn back the evil invading Titan army! Drive back the aliens across the Solar System, and finally defeat them on their homeworld in this modern remix of classic arcade shoot'em'ups. Titan Attacks! has the same easy-to-learn but hard-to-master gameplay of classic arcade shooters, but is packed full of new features, new strategies, and stylish neo-retro visuals. BATTLE swarms of alien fighters, bombers and giant boss motherships over 5 unique worlds and 100 levels of frantic action! FIGHT the Titan Invasion across the Earth, the Moon, Mars, Saturn and finally Titan itself! EARN bounty money and upgrade your ship with new weapons and powers! DESTROY falling wrecks, dodge hurtling asteroids and capture escaping aliens - or blast them from the skies! WIN prizes in sharp-shooter challenge stages and compete with other players for a place on the online leaderboards!
